EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Product - Model-based Test Automation - USA.Invite - 1 Week
EmailTemplate.subject: Tricentis Tosca Testsuite Webinar and Demo: Accelerate Business Innovation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Though test automation technology has been around for 40 years, only 15% of regression tests are automated.
Businesses are increasingly making the transition from manual to automated test cases to pursue technology-enabled revenue opportunities as rapidly as possible.
In this short webinar, see a demo of Tosca Testsuite and learn more about these topics:
- Automated testing and how it can speed time to value for your company - Leveraging the knowledge of business testers to automate test cases - Model-based testing and the use of modules in Tosca Testsuite
The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-model-based-test-automation-usa.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-model-based-test-automation-usa.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> Wed. November 13, 2013
1:00pm – 2:00pm EST
Michael Niessl
Sales Support at Tricentis
Joshua Davis
Tricentis Marketing
